name: Bytebot
headline: Browser automations powered by AI.
description:
Bytebot simplifies and streamlines web tasks by translating natural language prompts into browser automation, including clicks, form filling, and data extraction. 

The no-code playground enables users to develop robust, dynamic web automation scripts that adapt alongside changing web environments. 

Effortless to use and easy to integrate, Bytebot helps users boost their workflow efficiency and drive growth, all without the complexity.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:robotic-process-automation; industry:saas; industry:api; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

AI Scraping & Automation Tool
# 
Your Code-FreeWeb Automation
Playground
Simply prompt, confirm, and automate. Bytebot helps you create automations by guiding you through browser actions like clicks and form fills — no code needed.
[Start Automating Now](https://www.bytebot.ai/<http:/app.bytebot.ai/auth/sign-up>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b369e47de56f2c496d54a8/66e7de2b74963c9821ca065b_avatar_carl.png)Book a presentationLive 15 min demo](https://www.bytebot.ai/<https:/calendly.com/bytebot/bytebot-overview?back=1&month=2024-03>)
###### Build new agent

https://ycombinator.com/companies
###### Getting initial snapshot...

## Features
Automate tasks effortlessly by prompting actions, confirming suggestions, and building repeatable workflows—all without code.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b369e47de56f2c496d54a8/670587e446e098734521f951_bento_01.svg)
### Effortless Web Data Extraction
Automate data extraction with ease. Prompt to find and save key details—like names, emails, or images—from any webpage. From gathering insights to building comprehensive datasets, Bytebot handles the heavy lifting, so you can focus on decision-making.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b369e47de56f2c496d54a8/670588abf8f032a720dac7d3_bento_02.svg)
### Form Filling Made Simple
Need to log in or submit a form? Simply prompt the actions, confirm Bytebot's suggestions, and watch as it fills in the details, submits, and moves on to the next step. All actions are saved, creating a workflow you can reuse whenever needed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b369e47de56f2c496d54a8/670587f94455f9c23a321403_bento_03.svg)
### Run Automations at Scale
Execute powerful scraping or form filling workflows with Bytebot's scalable automation. Trigger manually or via API, and seamlessly integrate dynamic variables for personalized, flexible automation that fits your needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b369e47de56f2c496d54a8/670587e47d12bbbb5fa25391_bento_04.svg)
### Workflow Visibility with Session Inspection
Track every action in your workflows with detailed session history. Bytebot's session inspection lets you review past executions, inspect page elements, and quickly debug to ensure seamless automation.
### Seamless Self-Healing
Bytebot automatically adapts to changes in web pages, intelligently identifying similar structures and repairing workflows on the fly. Run workflows confidently across dynamic sites without constant manual adjustments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b369e47de56f2c496d54a8/670587e40ba71457be13f258_bento_05.svg)
## Use Cases
Just a few examples what you can achieve with Bytebot Playground.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7897bf119b982ac02dd18/670e1729212ab0adbcca0d38_logo_glassdoor.svg)
###### Source Company Reviews from Glassdoor
Monitor workplace sentiment by sourcing reviews from sites like Glassdoor. Collectsfeedback on company culture and management, providing valuable insights for HR and competitive analysis.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7897bf119b982ac02dd18/670e16fa4d33c13aeb26a7ec_logo_linkedin.svg)
###### Streamline Lead Generation from LinkedIn
Enhance your lead generation by automating data collection from professional networking sites. Build targeted outreach lists by gathering publicly available company and professional information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7897bf119b982ac02dd18/670d4c5f848ade9327a66e4e_logo_redfin.svg)
###### Aggregate Real Estate Listings from Redfin
Compile comprehensive real estate data by extracting property listings. Collect details such as price, location, and features, aiding in market analysis and client presentations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7897bf119b982ac02dd18/67078dec048b1abae9593a7f_logo_bloomberg.svg)
###### Extract Financial Data from Bloomberg
Stay ahead in the financial markets by automating data extraction from financial news outlets like Bloomberg. Gather stock prices, market news, and economic indicators for informed decision-making.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7897bf119b982ac02dd18/67078cd8f9cefc372a8f60e0_logo_y-combinator.svg)
###### Collect Startup Data from YCombinator
Access detailed startup information by extracting company data from YCombinator listings. Retrieve key details about emerging companies to support investment research and networking efforts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7897bf119b982ac02dd18/67078781690323eea0255eef_logo_amazon.svg)
###### Extract Product Details from Amazon
Automate the collection of product information from leading online marketplaces. Pull details like pricing, descriptions, and customer ratings to help you analyze market trends and optimize your product offerings.

Choose the plan that's right for you. Whether you're tinkering or looking to scale up, we have a pricing model to fit your needs.

generated_description:
**Bytebot Overview**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator Batch S21, Bytebot is a San Francisco-based startup focused on harnessing AI to simplify and enhance web tasks through automation. The company's primary mission is to empower users to automate browser actions effortlessly by using natural language prompts—think no more endless coding just to scrape data or fill forms.

**What Does Bytebot Do?**

Bytebot transforms how users interact with the web. It provides a no-code playground where individuals can create powerful web automation scripts that adapt to dynamic online environments. Whether it’s clicking buttons, filling out forms, or extracting data, Bytebot makes complicated automation intuitive and accessible.

### Key Features

1. **Code-Free Automation**: Users can prompt Bytebot to carry out tasks by straightforwardly describing what they want, allowing anyone—even non-coders—to automate their workflows.
   
2. **Dynamic Data Extraction**: Bytebot allows users to easily gather data from websites. Whether it's extracting contact information or product details, it handles the heavy lifting, letting teams focus on actionable insights instead of manual data collection.

3. **Self-Healing Workflows**: One of Bytebot's standout features is its ability to adapt to changes in web pages. No more broken scripts; it intelligently adjusts and maintains functionality, even when sites change.

4. **Session Inspection**: Users can review past automation sessions, inspect elements, and debug workflows easily, ensuring everything runs smoothly.

5. **Scalability**: Whether you’re a hobbyist or part of a large enterprise, Bytebot has a plan that fits your needs—from free trials for individual users to customizable solutions for big teams.

### Use Cases
Bytebot is versatile and can be used across various sectors:
- **HR Analysis**: Automate the sourcing of company reviews from platforms like Glassdoor.
- **Lead Generation**: Enhance outreach by automating data curation from LinkedIn.
- **Market Research**: Extract data from real estate listings or financial news sites, helping businesses stay competitive.

### Pricing

Bytebot offers multiple pricing tiers:
- **Hobbyist Plan**: $29/month for light users.
- **Startup Plan**: $299/month for growing teams.
- **Enterprise Solutions**: Customized pricing for larger organizations, featuring dedicated support and tailored integrations.

### Join the Revolution

With a small team of seven and backed by Group Partner Nan, Bytebot is poised for growth. If you’re looking to automate your web tasks without the fuss, give Bytebot a try. They’re actively hiring too, so if you have a knack for innovation, it might be worth a look.

Explore more about Bytebot on their website: [Bytebot.ai](https://www.bytebot.ai).
